text.けっぱるべー！\\n夢一直線の純心どさん娘: Gonne do me best! \nA naive country girl \nbeelining to her dream.
text.静かなる疾走者。\\n音速の先をめざして: A quiet runner. \nAiming to go beyond \nthe speed of sound
text.エスコートはお任せ！\\n華麗なジェントル娘: Leave escorting to me!\nGorgeous & gentle girl!
text.地方生まれの、素朴なクールドリーマー: A simple, cool dreamer\nfrom the countryside.
text.粗暴、奔放！ \\n謎テンションな黄金電波娘: Rude and unrestrained!\nMysterious energy\ngolden denpa girl!
text.清楚可憐。\\nアメリカ帰りの大和撫子: Neat and pretty.\nThe Yamato Nadeshiko\n from America.
text.タイマン上等！\\n頼れる我らの姐御寮長: She's up for a fight!\nOur trusty Miss Matron.
text.名門メジロ家の至宝。\\n優雅で一途なお嬢様: Pride of the prestigious\nMejiro family. Elegant,\ndetermined young lady.
text.北米の怪鳥！\\n快活奇抜なルチャリブレ: Mystery North American\nbird! The cheerful and\neccentric lucha libre
text.尊大なる歌劇王。\\nその哄笑は高らかに！: Haughty king of Opera.\nHis laugh is \nloud and proud!
text.背中で語れ！\\n硬派で頑固な一匹狼: Speak with my back!\nA hard-headed, \nstubborn lone wolf!
text.ウマ娘ちゃん大好き！\\nスーパー万能オタク娘: She loves Uma Musume!\nSuper all-around geek.
text.マイペース、マイライフ。\\n漂う雲のように…: My pace, my life.\nLike a \ndrifting cloud…
text.ツッコミは稲妻の如し\\n見せろ根性、浪花っ娘: She's like a bolt of\nlightning on the attack.
text.自由奔放思い出作り！\\n箱入りロイヤルレディ: No holds barred\nmemory making!\nSheltered Royal lady.
text.甘々な末っ子ガール。\\n早く大人になりたい！: The sweet youngest girl.\nCan't wait to grow up!
text.見えない影を追い走る\\nミステリアス少女: Mysterious girl who runs\nafter invisible shadows.
text.指示は絶対厳守！\\nサイボーグ・ウマ娘: Follow orders\nto the letter!\nCyborg horse girl.
text.気分は爽快スポーティ！\\n輝く汗も純粋に: Feeling fresh & sporty!\nHer sweat glistens pure!
text.目指せシチーガール！\\n地方出身の頑張り屋: Target: City Girl!\nHard worker\nfrom the countryside.
text.不幸体質？\\n健気に生きる薄幸乙女: Woeful constitution?\nA misfortunate maiden\nlives an admirable life.
text.元気いーっぱい！\\n家族思いの働き者: Full of energy!\nA hard worker who\nloves her family.
text.覚悟を背負って。\\n孤高貫く一等星: Filled with determination.\nA proud, independent, \nand persistent star.
text.思い切り笑って泣いて！\\n感情全開の正直娘: Laugh and cry as much as\n you can! An honest\ngirl full of emotions.
text.すべては計画通りに。\\n謹厳実直なメッチェン: Everything goes\naccording to plan.\nThe stern and honest Mädchen.
text.カワイイの閃光走る！\\nたくさん愛してね♪: Run like\na flash of cuteness!\nLove me lots♪
text.目指せプリンセス！\\n豪快おてんばウマ娘: Aim to be a princess!\nA tomboyish horse girl!
text.大暴走・学級委員長。\\nいつだって爆進！: The outrageous\nclass president.\nAlways on the move!
text.挑めよ世界！\\n不可能をパールにするお姉さん: Take on the world!\nThe neesan who makes the\nimpossible into pearls.
text.いたずら大好き！\\n構わないと噛みつくぞ！: She loves mischief!\nLeave me alone\nor I'll bite you!
text.ピュアにダダっ子！\\n絶対魔女になるもん！: A pure and spoiled brat!\nI'm definitely going\nto be a witch!
text.おっとり母性で癒してくれる優しいお姉さん: The gentle,\nmaternal oneesan\nwho soothes and heals.
text.ファンサなら任せて！\\n未来のトップウマドル: Leave fanservice to me!\nThe future top Uma-dol.
text.いつか英雄譚を。\\n想像力豊かな読書家: One day,\nI'll have a heroic tale.\nImaginative reader.
text.一か八か！\\nギリギリ攻めるアウトロー勝負師: All or nothing!\nAn outlaw gambler\npushing to the limit
text.クール＆ドライ！\\n小柄な体で勝ちをとる: Cool and dry!\nWinning with\nher petite body
text.花咲く笑顔♪\\n気配り上手なウマ娘: A smile that blooms\nAn attentive horse girl!
text.連敗しても、くじけない！\\n七転八起ガール: Lose all but heart!\nA girl who will\nrise to the occasion.
text.正義の炎が燃え盛る！\\n熱きヒーロー、見参！: The flame\nof justice burns bright!\nA passionate Hero rises!
text.福よ来い！\\n占い大好きなハッピー祈願娘: Bring the good fortune!\nAn easy-going girl who\nloves fortune telling!
text.前向きになりたい！\\nネガティブな頑張り屋: I want to be positive!\nA negative hard worker.
text.変わりたい！過去の\\n傷を抱えて走るお嬢様: I want to change!\nA young lady who runs\nwith scars of her past.
text.高飛車お嬢様。\\nそのプライドは空より高く！: Domineering young lady.\nHer pride is higher\nthan the sky!
text.愛され未完の大器。\\n今日こそ大勝利っ！: A beloved but\nunpolished great talent.\nToday is her big day!
text.管理徹底主義。\\n冷熱併せた敏腕ウマ娘: A thorough manager.\nHot and cold combined,\na capable horse girl.
text.気楽にいこーよ。\\n頼れるポジティブギャル: Let's take it easy.\nReliable and\npositive gal.
text.ターボ全開！\\n限界知らずの爆走ウマ娘！: Turbo full throttle!\nAn explosive horse girl\nwho knows no limits!
text.芯の強さはダイヤ級！\\nジンクスに挑むお嬢様: Diamond-grade core!\nA young lady\nwho defies jinxes!
text.みんなの心を照らす！\\n明朗快活お祭り娘！: Lights up our hearts!\nA cheerful and lively\nfestival girl!
text.憧れを追い求めて！\\n素直な努力家ウマ娘: Chase your dreams!\nAn honest and\nhardworking girl!
text.世界一輝く星になる！\\nカリスマ野心家ウマ娘: World's brightest\nstar to be! Charismatic\nUmamusu of ambition.
text.儚くとも強く輝け。\\nガラスの脚を持つ令嬢: Shine short and bright.\nThe young lady\nwith glass legs.
text.武を以て礼節を成し、駆ける。\\n無骨なウマ娘: Charge, with might\nand decorum.\nA rugged horse girl.
text.夢は三冠！！常に全力！！\\n限界超えがち！？: Dreams of the triple crown!! \nAlways full power!! \nLiable to break her limits!?
text.意志は固くペースは緩く！\\nのんびりご令嬢: A strong will \nat a loose pace! \nCarefree Lady.
text.爽やか完璧優等生！\\nなのに脇役気質…？: Flawless honor student! \nBut she likes \nthe support role…?
text.感謝のしるしに奇跡を。\\n優しく穏やかなウマ娘: A miracle as a sign of \ngratitude. Kind and \ngentle horsegirl.
text.笑顔が素敵なトレセン\\n学園理事長秘書さん: Secretary to the \nTracen Academy President \nwith a beautiful smile.
text.URAからやってきた、厳しくも優しい仕事人: A strict but gentle \nworker from the URA.
text.みんなが輝く舞台を！心つなぐ、イベントP: Connecting hearts on \nthe stage where everyone \nsparkles, event producer!
